item.title: A Day in Boonton: A Journey into Quiet Beauty
item.description: On April 27th, 2025, I found myself drawn to a small, unassuming getaway—Boonton, NJ. It wasn’t one of those days marked by a whirlwind of plans or urgent appointments. Instead, I craved change from the everyday rhythms of life and wanted to immerse myself in a tranquil, unhurried environment, even if only for a few precious hours. What unfolded was a day embroidered with moments of quiet introspection, unexpected photographic revelations, and slow, deliberate pleasure in nature’s simple wonders.
